naruto.speaker: Itachi Uchiha
naruto.quote: People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That's how they define "reality". But what does it mean to be "correct" or "true"? Merely vague concepts... Their "reality" may all be a mirage. Can we consider them to simply be living in their own world, shaped by their beliefs?

naruto.speaker: Itachi Uchiha
naruto.quote: If you want to kill me, despise me, hate me, and live in an unsightly way... Run, and cling to life, and then some day, when you have the same eyes as I do, come before me.

naruto.speaker: Itachi Uchiha
naruto.quote: You aren't even worth killing, foolish little brother.

naruto.speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
naruto.quote: If you think I'm just a foolish kid ruled by his emotions, that's fine. Following Itachi's path would be childish, the whispering of fools who don't know hatred. If anyone else tries to ridicule the way I live, I'll slaughter everyone they ever cared about. And then maybe they'll understand what it's like to taste... a little of my hatred.

naruto.speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
naruto.quote: *Talking to Naruto* Just shut up for once! What the hell do you know about it?! It's not like you ever had a family in the first place! You were on your own right from the beginning, what makes you think you know anything about it?! Huh?! I'm suffering now because I had those ties, how on earth could you possibly understand, what it feels like to lose all that?!

naruto.speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
naruto.quote: *Introducing himself to Kakashi, Naruto and Sakura* My speaker is Sasuke Uchiha. I hate a lot of things, and I don't particularly like anything. What I have is not a dream, because I will make it a reality. I'm going to restore my clan, and kill a certain someone.

naruto.speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
naruto.quote: I have long since closed my eyes... My only goal is in the darkness.

naruto.speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
naruto.quote: The pain of being alone...is not an easy one to bear. Why is it...that I can understand your pain? But...I already have many people who are important to me now...and I can't let you hurt any of them. Even if I have to kill you!

naruto.speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
naruto.quote: I won't run away anymore... I won't go back on my word... That is my ninja way!

naruto.speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
naruto.quote: You're such a loser, Naruto.

naruto.speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
naruto.quote: Are you alright, crybaby?

naruto.speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
naruto.quote: Naruto... I know you're special but, I AM MORE SPECIAL THAN YOU!

naruto.speaker: Deidara
naruto.quote: Shut up! I killed Sasuke Uchiha! And you're next, you art-hating sack of wrinkles!

naruto.speaker: Deidara
naruto.quote: *Before killing the Suna guards* Look at those fools. They have no appreciation for art. You have to feel art. And true art... is an EXPLOSION!

naruto.speaker: Deidara
naruto.quote: Art is a BANG!

naruto.speaker: Hidan
naruto.quote: Kakuzu... Could you get me my body, pleeease?

naruto.speaker: Sakura Haruno
naruto.quote: Inu pig!

naruto.speaker: Nara Shikamaru
naruto.quote: Man... What a drag...

naruto.speaker: Hatake Kakashi
naruto.quote: I'm telling you this because you don't get it. You think you get it, which is not the same as actually getting it. Get it?

naruto.speaker: Nara Shikamaru
naruto.quote: How troublesome...

naruto.speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
naruto.quote: A true hero always arrives late.

naruto.speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
naruto.quote:
If he rips my arms off, I'll kick him to death.
If he rips my legs off, I'll bite him to death!
If he rips my head off, I'll stare him to death!
And if he gouges out my eyes, I'll curse him
from beyond the grave..!

naruto.speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
naruto.quote: I am strong because I have people to protect.

naruto.speaker: Itachi Uchiha
naruto.quote: Foolish brother, if you wish to kill me - hate me, detest me, and survive in an unsightly way. Run... run and cling to life.

naruto.speaker: Obito Uchiha
naruto.quote: In the ninja world, those who don't follow the rules are trash. But, those who abandon their friends are even worse than trash.

naruto.speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
naruto.quote: And my dream is to be the greatest Hokage! That way, people will stop disrespecting me and start treating me like I'm somebody. Someone important!

naruto.speaker: Haku
naruto.quote: When people are protecting something truly precious to them. They truly can become...as strong as they need to be!

naruto.speaker: Gaara
naruto.quote: Not enough... blood.

naruto.speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
naruto.quote: BELIEVE IT!!

naruto.speaker: Gaara
naruto.quote: I want to be needed, this is what I've learned from meeting and fighting Uzumaki Naruto.

naruto.speaker: Rock Lee
naruto.quote: A dropout will beat a genius through hard work.

naruto.speaker: Madara Uchiha
naruto.quote: Love is not necessary, power is the only true necessity.

naruto.speaker: Itachi Uchiha
naruto.quote: I actually don't think something like perfection exists. That is I think why we are born able to absorb things... and by comparing ourselves with something else we can finally head in a good direction.

naruto.speaker: Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki
naruto.quote: The past does not exist to remind us that the future cannot be changed. It exists to remind us what the future can be.

naruto.speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
naruto.quote: There is no telling what kind of pain will come  after me, but... if I stop believing because of that, if the hero should change, it'll turn into another story from the one my master left behind. Then it wont be Naruto! I can't write novels like my master did. That's why the sequel has to come from the life I live no matter how great the pain, I'll continue walking because that's who Naruto is!

naruto.speaker: Sai
naruto.quote: Even if I force myself to smile. It seems I'm the type of person who ends up being hated.

naruto.speaker: Itachi Uchiha
naruto.quote: In this moment, I am euphoric. Not because of any phony Shinobi's blessing. But because, I'm enlightened by my intelligence.

naruto.speaker: Itachi Uchiha
naruto.quote: Knowledge and awareness are vague, and perhaps better called illusions. Everyone lives within their own subjective interpretation.

naruto.speaker: Pain
naruto.quote: Learn to embrace the fear of feeling about what it's like to contemplate what it is to know true pain. Because when I had nothing and no one - I always had Pain.

naruto.speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
naruto.quote: (About Sakura) Was she having fun in her little make-believe fantasy of true love? As for me, I have absolutely no reason to love her and likewise, I can see no reason why she would love me.

naruto.speaker: Madara Uchiha
naruto.quote: The longer you live... The more you realize that reality is just made of pain, suffering and emptiness...

naruto.speaker: Madara Uchiha
naruto.quote: It seems that you still want to dance but... You will not be able to make steps anymore.

naruto.speaker: Madara Uchiha
naruto.quote: I'd be lying if I said things are going according to my plan... but beggars can't be choosers, right?

naruto.speaker: Madara Uchiha
naruto.quote: [Last words to Hashirama] As comrades, huh... well... if that's how... we... will.... *smiles*

naruto.speaker: Pain
naruto.quote: Feel pain, think about pain, accept pain, know pain... Shinra Tensei!
